name: Siren Head VR
description:
Siren Head VR is a survival horror game developed by Fletcher St-Germain and inspired by Trevor Henderson. (Note: currently must be downloaded through google drive, as the file is larger than itch.io's minimum of 1GB. Sorry for any inconvenience)

Navigate through the a terrifying maze of rooms, as you attempt to free the sufferers of Siren Head through execution. Avoid the turned sufferers as they attempt to convert you, and finally, end your life to prevent your body from becoming a vessel of Siren Head's hell.

Works best with oculus touch controllers, but any headset and open vr controller should work. 

Please join my development discord to give feedback and to find out about other games. Simply joining and saying hi means a lot! https://discord.gg/fhFCfBb
